author: ilene
msg: The token queue and operations map can now grow to accomodate really
large XPath expressions.   Starting sizes of the data structures remain set
at the size in the current code.
I created new classes org.apache.xml.utils.ObjectVector (based on org.apache.xml.utils.IntVector)
and org.apache.xpath.compiler.OpMapVector to store the token queue
This patch is essentially a stop gap until the new parser (xslt20 branch) is integrated.

author: santiagopg
msg: Set default type of parameters to be reference. The type of a parameter
cannot be determined statically in XSLT 1.0.

author: mkwan
msg: Fix a problem in class namespace format and also cleanup the indentation.

author: mkwan
msg: The default type of a <xsl:param> should be result tree.

author: mkwan
msg: For Bugzilla 13106. Visit the XPath expressions created for match patterns.
